package task5;

public class Box {

    double width;
    double height;
    double depth;

    //TODO your code
	 public Box(double width,double height,double depth) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    	
    	this.depth = depth;
    	this.height = height;
    	this.width = width;
	}
    public double volume() {
    	
    	
    	
    	return (depth*height*width);
    }



}
